job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This innovative AI start up is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their growing team. The company monitors AI after it is live to track any discrepancies or biases that hadnâ€™t been recognized already. They have their Series A and set up for a lot of growth and success.  As an SRE you will be heavily leveraging Kubernetes and working closely with the data and machine learning teams. You will be interacting with a variety of infrastructures, depending the user so familiarity with both cloud and on premise will be helpful. The Offer Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. Jordan Taylor
